    • Method Detail

      • hitTest

        protected boolean hitTest(int hitX,
              int hitY)
        Description copied from class: NMapCalloutOverlay
        See if a given hit point is within the bounds of callout. Override to modify the way an item is hit tested. The hit point is relative to screen coordinates. The default implementation just checks to see if the hit point is within the touchable bounds of the callout.
        Overrides:
        hitTest in class NMapCalloutOverlay

        Description copied from class: NMapCalloutOverlay

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if title is truncated on this callout overlay, false otherwise.

      • drawCallout

        protected void drawCallout(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
               NMapView mapView,
               boolean shadow,
               long when)
        Description copied from class: NMapCalloutOverlay
        Draw callout overlay over the map view.
        Specified by:
        drawCallout in class NMapCalloutOverlay
        Parameters:
        canvas - The Canvas upon which to draw. Note that this may already have a transformation applied, so be sure to leave it the way you found it.
        mapView - the MapView that requested the draw. Use NMapView.getMapProjection() to convert between on-screen pixels and latitude/longitude pairs.
        shadow - If true, draw the shadow layer. If false, draw the overlay contents.

      • getDrawable

        protected android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDrawable(int rank,
                                             int itemState)
        Description copied from class: NMapCalloutOverlay
        Get drawable for a item on this callout overlay.
        Specified by:
        getDrawable in class NMapCalloutOverlay
        Parameters:
        rank - item index on this callout overlay
        itemState - state bitset
        Returns:
        drawable or null when this callout overlay has no items.
